scripts.package: rimraf *.zip && zip -rq temp-app.zip dist node_modules package*.json serverless.yml deploy-configs webpack.config.js source-map-install.js && mv temp-app.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run build && serverless deploy -s dev
scripts.local: npm run build && serverless invoke local -s dev -p events/test-event.json -f hello-service
scripts.local-anonym-cart: npm run build && serverless invoke local -s dev -p events/test-event.json -f create-cart-service
scripts.local-get-cust-id: npm run build && serverless invoke local -s dev -p events/get-customer-id-event.json -f get-cust-id
scripts.local-get-products: npm run build && serverless invoke local -s dev -p events/get-customer-id-event.json -f get-products
scripts.local-get-cust-cart: npm run build && serverless invoke local -s dev -p events/get-customer-cart-event.json -f get-customer-cart
scripts.local-get-customer-by-id: npm run build && serverless invoke local -s dev -p events/get-customer-by-id-event.json -f get-customer-by-id
scripts.local-create-customer: npm run build && serverless invoke local -s dev -p events/create-customer-event.json -f create-customer
